EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-02-21-Container Platforms Survey.ES 1.ES 1 - HTML Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: $10 Amazon Gift Card for 2 Minute Survey | Container Platforms
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://bit.ly/2E1RmLt]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, When it comes to container platforms, should you be ready for production now or should you wait until next year? Let's find out together. Take this weeks 2-Minute Survey, Container Platforms, <[[http://bit.ly/2E1RmLt]]> to help establish a baseline on where organizations like yours are in their containers adoption journey and identify which platforms (Kubernetes, OpenShift, Docker Swarm) are winning in the race towards production.
Take Survey Now <[[http://bit.ly/2E1RmLt]]>
To say thanks, you will earn a $10 Gift Card upon completion of the survey. Furthermore, we are offering a $50 Gift Card for agreeing to a 30-minute meeting to learn how Turbonomic can help you self-manage container platforms. Regards, Megan
